description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(269).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,164,0,0,1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,2,5,162,329,820]; [n le 6 select I[n] else 164*Self(n-3)+Self(n-6): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 19 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
